ygData.subject: A Moral Delima
ygData.msgSnippet: Well something has been bothering me lately and seeing Kyle s pic on Xenogy (if you havn t noticed I can t spell to save my life, hehe) has made me decide to
ygData.messageBody:
Well something has been bothering me lately and seeing Kyle's pic on Xenogy (if you havn't noticed I can't spell to save my life, hehe) has made me decide to ask you guys what you think. I play a female char on Veeshan, a fairly well known one. In real life I am a 22 year old male. Well except for 2 people, everyone on the server thinks Im a female in real life. I am starting to feel very bad about this.

I have a regular group that I always play with and these guys are always fighting over me because they think Im female. The first time we grouped they flirted heavily and I was scared to tell them I was male because we all got along so well. Well that was 20 lvl's ago.

The straw that broke the camels back happened the other night. I have been in a guild for a pretty long time and was scheduled to marry the guild leader. Well the entire guild including the leader believed me to be female in real life also. Lets just say I never showed up for the wedding. I transferred all my equip to a new Dark Elf ShadowKnight and deleted my lvl 21, hoping to move into the shadows forever. So here I am, lvl 1, no friends, my regular group is sending me emails left and right asking where am I.

Did I do the right thing by just dissapearing or should I just email them and say Im a liar and just pray they don't cuss me out to bad.

Not to many things make me cry, but this has. I guess mainly I needed to vent to someone, so thanx for listening guys.

Tiger

PS - Kyle, I hope your mail box didn't instantly fill up with emails from dirty old EQ men after posting your pic. =)
